msItemStruct.note: (2) belongs to (3), they don't join. (4) belongs to (5), they don't join. (11) three more fragments of this manuscript are set aside as 4747.

physDesc.p: Fragments 1-11 (in mm), (1) 23 x 28, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 65 x 36, (A) 6 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (3) 40 x 37, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 75 x 27, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, bottom margin, (5) 49 x 21, (A) traces, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (6) 81 x 20, (A) 3 lines, left margin (?), (B) 3 lines, right margin, (7) 132 x 38, (A) 7 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (8) 124 x 28, (A) 16 lines, no margins, (B) 14 lines, bottom margin (?), (9) 98 x 50, (A) 12 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (10) 79 x 31, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) 4 lines, left margin, (11) 76 x 69, (A) 11 lines, no margins, (B) 9 lines, right margin
